Title: Fisalia Knight's Letter
Text:
"Even in the endâ€¦ I never found the so-called power of the dragon.
As the knight who served the 17th head of the family, I failed to protect the one I swore to. I failed to fulfill her wish, to redeem her family's name.
I achieved nothing. Died in a foreign land... Ha, what a pitiful, wasted life."
